company.name: Pruzan Law Offices
company.description: The Pruzan Law Firm was established in 1929 by Abraham Pruzan, Esq. We specialize in NYS landlord and tenant law, actively representing our clients in Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island. We pride our reputation on protecting our client's very best interests.

about.headline: About Us
about.content: The Pruzan Law Firm was established in 1929 by Abraham Pruzan, Esq. We specialize in NYS landlord and tenant law, actively representing our clients in Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island. We pride our reputation on protecting our client's very best interests. Our new Brooklyn Heights address is just a five minute walk from the court houses. Our phones, fax and emails are monitored seven days a week.

values.title: Hands On Attention
values.description: We provide hands on attention and expedited resolutions for landlords

values.title: Immediate Solutions
values.description: We provide immediate solutions and optimum settlements for tenants

values.title: Dedicated Commitments
values.description: We listen to our client's needs and concerns. We get the results you expect with dedicated commitments
